name: Icon On Sliders
description: Set your icon as a slider thumb

glow-mode.name: Glow
glow-mode.description:
How the <cy>glow</c> works for the icon on slider.
<cp>1. Default:</c> use player settings.
<cp>2. On touch:</c> enable glow only when touching the slider.
<cp>3. Force:</c> enable glow on slider icon even if it is disabled for player.

lighten-touch.name: Lighten on touch
lighten-touch.description:
Make the icon color lighter when touching the slider.
<cj>Note:</c> This may be more or less noticeable depending on the icon colors

anim-strength.name: Animation strength
anim-strength.description:
(related to the <cp>cube</c>, <cp>ship</c>, <cp>ufo</c>, <cp>swing</c> and <cp>jetpack</c> animations)
How much the icon tilts when moving.

affect-editor-slider.name: Editor position and scale sliders
affect-editor-slider.description: Whether the editor position and scale sliders are affected

affect-trigger-sliders.name: Trigger sliders
affect-trigger-sliders.description: Whether the sliders in the triggers are affected
